parameters.name: resourceType
parameters.description: Type of resources to retrieve. Valid values are: routes, waypoints, notes, regions, charts
parameters.name: resourceClass
limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return

parameters.name: distance
radius
distance
parameters.description: Limit results to resources that fall within a square area, centered around the vessel's position, the edges of which are the sepecified distance in meters from the vessel.

parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: Limit results to resources that fall within the bounded area defined as lower left (south west) and upper right (north east) coordinates [swlon,swlat,nelon,nelat]
parameters.name: bbox
parameters.description: Limit results to resources that fall within the bounded area defined as lower left and upper right x,y coordinates x1,y1,x2,y2
Limit results to resources that fall within the bounded area defined as lower left (south west) and upper right (north east) coordinates [swlon,swlat,nelon,nelat]

200.description: List of resources identified by their UUID

distance.description: Total distance from start to end

start.description: The waypoint UUID at the start of the route

end.description: The waypoint UUID at the end of the route

feature.title: Feature
feature.description: A GeoJSON feature object which describes a route

position.description: Position related to note. Alternative to region or geohash.

region.description: Pointer / path to Region related to note (e.g. /resources/routes/{uuid}. Alternative to position or geohash

geohash.description: Area related to note. Alternative to region or position

tilemapUrl.description: A url to the tilemap of the chart for use in TMS chartplotting apps

region.description: Region related to note. A pointer to a region UUID. Alternative to geohash

geohash.description: Position related to chart. Alternative to region

chartUrl.description: A url to the chart file's storage location

scale.description: The scale of the chart, the larger number from 1:200000

chartLayers.description: If the chart format is WMS, the layers enabled for the chart.

bounds.description: The bounds of the chart. An array containing the position of the upper left corner, and the lower right corner. Useful when the chart isn't inherently geo-referenced.

items.description: Position of a corner of the chart
